explains: n. 不耐烦，无耐心；热切，急切

sentences.en: James began to show signs of impatience.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯开始显得不耐烦。

sentences.en: Possibly believing me to be tolerant of her impatience, she rolled her eyes and said, "Yeah."
sentences.cn: 她可能认为我能容忍她的不耐烦，于是转了转眼珠，说：“是的。”

sentences.en: She showed impatience to continue the climb.
sentences.cn: 她表现出要继续往上爬的急切。
